data.title: Apple Folds AI Health Coach Into Ecosystem Investors Are Watching
data.description:
Apple (NasdaqGS:AAPL) is shutting down its standalone AI health coach project, known internally as Mulberry.
The company plans to roll out AI driven coaching tools gradually within its existing Health app instead of launching a separate product.
This change reflects a focus on user safety and regulatory requirements in digital health and AI.

For you as an investor looking at Apple beyond iPhones and Macs, health and wellness sit alongside services, wearables and software as part of the...
